message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you still get a good share.
I understand you wanting a larger share, but let's be fair. This offer is a good compromise.
I see you're willing to compromise, so I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your counteroffer.
Time is running out, and the value is decreasing. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to take a smaller step back. This is as low as I'll go.
This is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
You think 50/50 is fair, but I've been consistent in wanting a bit more. Meet me in the middle between my last offer and your 'fair' split.
